listing-policy-disclaimer: Duk kayayyakin da aka jera akan wannan shafin babu amincewar hukuma, kuma an samar dasu don dalilai na bayanai ne kawai. Idan kuna son ƙara kayan ko bayar da ra'ayi kan manufofin, ku shigar da batun a GitHub.
loading-error-try-again-later: Bazai fito da bayanai ba. A sake gwadawa.
nav-bridges-description: Web3 ya samo asali ne zuwa ecosystem na farkon L1 blockchains da dabara mai dorewa ta L2
nav-builders-home-description: Ka'idodin ga masu don gini akan Ethereum — ga magina, kuma na magina
nav-contribute-description: Idan kuna so ku taimaka, wannan zai taimake ku
nav-dao-description: Membobin Al'ummomi ba tare da ikon tsakiya ba
nav-dapps-description: Bincika wadataccen yanayin manhajojin da suke amfani da Ethereum
nav-defi-description: Yanayin da zai chanja kasuwar hada hadar kudade a duk fadin duniya
nav-desci-description: Yanayin da zai kawo chanji ga tsarin kimiyya na yanzu a fadin duniya
nav-desoc-description: Dandalin da akayi su akan blockchain don hulɗar zamantakewa da kirkirar abubuwa
nav-did-description: Badawa da kuma mallakar shaidu masu 'yancin kansu
nav-docs-description: Takardun suna taimaka maka don gane yadda za'ayi gini akan Ethereum
nav-docs-design-description: Bayanin akan ƙalubalen web3, mafi kyawun ayyuka da fahimtar bincike mai amfani
nav-docs-foundation-description: Tushe mafi anfani don kirkira akan Ethereum
nav-docs-overview-description: Gurin takardun karin bayani don developers
nav-docs-stack-description: Fahimtar dukkan cikakkun bayanai akan tsarin Ethereum
nav-eip-description: Ma'aunin ƙayyade sabbin abubuwa ko kuma matakai
nav-emerging-description: Fahimtar sauran sabbin abubuwan amfani don Ethereum
nav-ethereum-org-description: Wannan shafin yanar gizon mallakin al'umma ne, saboda haka, ku shigo kuma ku bada taku gudummawar
nav-ethereum-wallets-description: Manhaja ce don mu'amala da account dinku na Ethereum
nav-events-description: 'Yancin cin gashin kai da samun dama ga kowa
nav-events-irl-description: Kowanne wata akwai gagarumin taron Ethereum
nav-events-online-description: Dubun dubatar mutane masu sha'awar Ethereum suna taruwa a cikin wannan Al'ummar

nav-get-started-description: Matakin farko don anfani da Ethereum
nav-governance-description: Hanyar ta kunsi daga darajar tsarin Ethereum
nav-grants-description: Jerin kididdigaggun mutane akan ayyuka da suke suke bada tallafi
nav-guide-create-account-description: Kowa zai iya bude account din Ethereum a ko da yaushe, kuma kyauta ta cikin walet din
nav-guide-create-account-label: Yadda za'a bude account din Ethereum
nav-guide-overview-description: Jerin dukkan ka'idodin a wuri daya
nav-guide-revoke-access-description: A kula wajen mu'amala da smart contracts da kuma manhajojin Ethereum
nav-guide-revoke-access-label: Yadda za'a soke damar shiga smart contract
nav-guide-use-wallet-description: Koyi yadda zakuyi anfani da abubuwan walet
nav-guides-description: Matakan da zasu taimaka muku don farawa
nav-history-description: Jadawalin lokaci na dukkan forks da kuma sabuntawa
nav-layer-2-description: Mafi sauki kuma mafi arha cinikayyar Ethereum
nav-learn-by-coding-description: Ababen da za su taimaka wajen gwada Ethereum
nav-local-env-description: Zaɓi da kuma saita tsarin gina Ethereum
nav-mainnet-description: Ana iya gina aikace-aikacen blockchain na yan kasuwa akan budaddiyar Mainnet din Ethereum
nav-nft-description: Hanyar da za'a iya wakiltar abu na musamman akan kadarar tushe ta Ethereum
nav-open-research-description: Ɗaya daga cikin mahimman ƙarfin Ethereum shine al'ummar ta mai tsananin bincike
nav-participate-overview-description: Dubi akan yadda za'a dama da kai
nav-quizzes-description: Ka san yadda ka fahimfi Ethereum da sauran kuɗaɗen kiripto
nav-refi-description: Tsarin tattalin arziƙi da aka gina akan ka'idodin sabuntawa
nav-research-description: Hanyoyin da ake amfani da su wurin inganta Ethereum
nav-roadmap-description: Hanyoyin samun chanjawa, tsaro da dorewa ga Ethereum
nav-roadmap-future-description: Ƙaddamar da Ethereum a matsayin cibiyar sadarwa mai ƙarfi da 'yancin gashi kai
nav-roadmap-scaling-description: Sabunta hanyar sadarwa don ƙara rage farashin kayan aiki da kuma sauri
nav-roadmap-scaling-label: Sabunta hanyar sadarwa don ƙara rage farashin kayan aiki da kuma sauri
nav-roadmap-security-description: Tabbatar da cewa Ethereum ya kasance mai juriya ga kowane nau'in hari a nan gaba
nav-roadmap-ux-description: Yakama a daukaka amfani da Ethereum
nav-run-a-node-description: Kasance mai cikakken iko yayin taimakawa wajen tsare hanyar sadarwa
nav-security-description: Koyi mafi kyawun ayyuka wajen amfani da cryptocurrency
nav-stablecoins-description: Stablecoins kudi ne na Ethereum da aka tsara don tsayawa akan ƙayyadaddun ƙima
nav-staking-pool-description: Saka hannun jari kuma ku sami lada tare da kowane adadin ETH ta hanyar shiga tare da wasu
nav-staking-saas-description: Masu aikin node suna kula da gudanar da masu tantance kwastomas
nav-staking-solo-description: Gudanar da kayan aikin gida kuma da kuma kaina ana ƙara tsaro da rarraba 'yancin kan sadarwar Ethereum
nav-start-building-description: Muhimman bayanai ga masu shigowa yanzu
nav-translation-program-description: Ƙoƙarin haɗin gwiwa don fassara ethereum.org zuwa dukkanin harsuna
nav-tutorials-description: Jerin da ayyukan da aka tsara na koyarwa al'umma
nav-use-cases-description: Nemo dabaru daban-daban don amfanin Ethereum
nav-what-is-ethereum-description: Ku gane meya mai da Ethereum na musamman
nav-what-is-web3-description: Madadin mulkin mallaka na tsakiya waɗanda ke yin umarni da dokoki
nav-whitepaper-description: Asalin kundin tsarin Ethereum wanda Vitalik Buterin ya rubuta a shekarar 2014
nav-zkp-description: Hanyar tabbatar da ingancin magana ba tare da bayyana ita maganar kanta
page-languages-learn-more: Ƙara koyo akan Shirin Fassarar mu
page-languages-recruit-community: Ku taimaka mana don fassara ethereum.org.
page-languages-want-more-header: Shin kuna so ku ga ethereum.org a harshe daban?
page-languages-want-more-paragraph: masu fassara ethereum.org koyaushe suna fassara shafuka cikin harsuna da yawa. Don ganin abin da suke aiki akai yanzu ko yin rajista don haduwa dasu, karanta gameda
product-disclaimer: An jera samfuri da ayyuka da zai dace ga al'ummar Ethereum. Haɗin kan samfur ko aikinba ya nuna cewa an amince daga rukunin shafin yanar gizon ethereum.org, ko Gidauniyar Ethereum.
rollup-component-developer-docs: Takardar karin bayani don masu kirkira
search-eth-address: Wannan yayi kama da adireshin Ethereum. Bamu bada bayanai ga adireshin ba. Ku gwada duba shi akan block explorer kamar
site-description: Ethereum dandamali ne na duniya, wanda aka raba shi don kuɗi da sabbin nau'ikan aikace-aikace. A kan Ethereum, zaku iya rubuta lambar da ke sarrafa kuɗi, da gina aikace-aikacen da za a iya samun dama a ko'ina cikin duniya.
translation-banner-body-new: Kuna kallon wannan shafi cikin Ingilishi saboda ba mu fassara shi ba tukunna. Ku taimaka mana ku fassara mana abun ciki.
translation-banner-body-update: Akwai sabon kalar wannan shafin amma cikin Turanci kawai yake yanzu. Ku taimaka mana ku fassara mana abun ciki.
translation-banner-no-bugs-content: Ba a fassara wannan shafin. Mun bar wannan shafin da gangan a Turanci a yanzu.
translation-banner-title-new: Ku taimaka ku fassara wannan shafin
translation-banner-title-update: Ku taimaka ku gyara wannan shafin
try-using-search: Kokarin bincike don samun abunda ake nema ko
website-last-updated: Shafin yanar gizo da aka gyara a karshe
